Title: News Framework for Windows Phone 7
Description: News Framework is an offline news reading framework on which any RSS based news website can have its own Windows Phone 7 application in just minutes. The configuration, content and styles can be managed from outside of the framework itself to fit the needs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
News Framework is an offline news reading framework on which any RSS based news website can have its own Windows Phone 7 application in just minutes. The configuration, content and styles can be managed from outside of the framework itself to fit the needs.

Features

  • Offline news reading experience
  • Text size adjustment
  • Save for later
  • Share with friends via SMS/Email
  • News by category
  • Rotation support
  • Search within the news
  • Theme support
  • Open Source
  • Full functioning demo included: an unofficial Mashable fan app. See below images.
  • For continued development and customization, feel free to contact: http://www.TanzimSaqib.com
  • Video demonstration of Mashable app: http://codetv.net/36/introducing-news-framework-for-windows-phone-7
  • 3 steps to build a Windows Phone 7 app using News Framework: http://weblogs.asp.net/tanzimsaqib/archive/2010/10/03/3-steps-to-build-a-windows-phone-7-app-using-news-framework.aspx
